name: Apozy
headline: Apozy makes every website safe to browse
description: Apozy is a browser defense platform powered by "Native Browser Isolation" technology. It neutralizes phishing, malware, and impersonation attacks in real-time by sandboxing dangerous websites at the time of click. This creates a safe "read-only" environment for browsing, even if the original website is malicious. Businesses use Apozy Airlock to protect their employees from online threats and prevent data breaches.

# Make every site safe to browse
The most targeted companies around the world rely on Airlock — Apozy’s Browser Defense Platform — to automatically disarm dangerous websites at time-of-click using **Native Browser Isolation**.
[Get a Demo Now →](https://www.apozy.com/</get-a-demo>)
↓
![](https://images.prismic.io/airlock/49811897-705b-495e-a767-e9dc80c3cbf3_featured-wide-dark-logo-only.svg?auto=compress,format)
The Browser Defense Platform ❤️
# A fully unified suite of cyber security products
We bring together everything that's required to beat fraudulent websites and online activities that lead to newsworthy breaches at your company.
Our platform disarms dangerous websites with **Native Browser Isolation** and automatically hunts and takes down phishing sites imitating your brand. 
[See how it works →](https://www.apozy.com/</get-a-demo>)
![](https://images.prismic.io/airlock/f99ef381-921b-4b84-80d4-cd2183a28fd6_noun_cycle+left_964995.svg?auto=compress,format)Prevent

# Industry Tested and Proven
Apozy’s leadership is recognized in analyst and academic reports with **near-zero false positive rates**.
  * [![](https://images.prismic.io/airlock/e1636302-8846-4960-b81d-b51bd0ac4cbc_gartner.png?auto=compress,format)Innovation for Browser Isolation](https://www.apozy.com/<#0>)
  * [![](https://images.prismic.io/airlock/f69978a7-1685-4fd5-ab04-855416350090_ieee.jpg?auto=compress,format)Phishing Detection in 2020](https://www.apozy.com/<#0>)
  * [![](https://images.prismic.io/airlock/8121842b-0a22-4a06-870d-54a85a6262a1_cornell.png?auto=compress,format)Personalized Anti-Phishing](https://www.apozy.com/<#0>)

# Future-proof & scales with your business
No complicated encryption-breaking-proxies to setup.
Deploy a lightweight browser extension **more powerful than any proxy** to protect your entire business in less than a minute.
[Explore deployment →](https://www.apozy.com/</deployment>)
![](https://images.prismic.io/airlock/bd39afbf-fb9c-44cc-ace2-54721826fa73_GC-Partner-no_outline-V.png?auto=compress,format&rect=2,0,720,720&w=300&h=300)
Developers love us ❤️
# Integrate with existing tools
We made it easy for you to bring the power of **the world's largest Visual Threat Database** into your existing tools.
Protect your customers with an easy-to-use API that can determine if a URL is malicious in real-time.
[Read the docs →](https://www.apozy.com/<https:/docs.apozy.com>)
![](https://images.prismic.io/airlock/0068ba8d-9e6b-4951-b3c5-ba0bd918d105_integrations_vertical.svg?auto=compress,format&rect=0,45,97,61&w=1024&h=640)
# Never worry about dangerous URLs again
Email proxies are not enough to avoid devastating newsworthy breaches.
Play video

generated_description:
Apozy is a San Francisco-based company that aims to make every website safe to browse. Founded in 2017 and a member of Y Combinator's Winter 2017 batch, Apozy is primarily a browser defense platform utilizing "Native Browser Isolation" technology. This technology can neutralize phishing, malware, and impersonation attacks in real time by sandboxing potentially harmful websites just as users click on them. Essentially, it creates a safe "read-only" environment, which is crucial even if the original site is malicious.

The flagship product, Apozy Airlock, is used by businesses to protect their employees from online threats and to prevent data breaches—an increasing concern in today’s digital landscape. With a small but effective team of 9 employees, Apozy prioritizes creating a robust, user-friendly platform that not only blocks unsafe content but also provides a frictionless experience for users. The team is backed by NaN as their Group Partner.

Their platform serves multiple functions including:
- **Native Browser Isolation** 
- **Central Ad Block** 
- **Instant Deployment** 
- **Data Access & Insight** via features like "See Behind URLs."

The platform stands out by ensuring that businesses can deploy these features rapidly—often in under a minute—without complex setups. They also offer a powerful API that lets developers integrate comprehensive URL threat detection into their existing applications.

Apozy has positioned itself as a reliable security solution, emphasizing ease of use and minimal disruption to workflow. Its leadership garners recognition for maintaining near-zero false positives in phishing detection, making it a trusted partner for many targeted companies globally.

If you’re interested in knowing more about their offerings, you can visit [Apozy's website](https://www.apozy.com/), or request a demo to see their technology in action. Overall, Apozy isn’t just setting out to make browsing safer; they’re redefining how users interact with the web—one click at a time.
